item.description:
How about we try our hand at voting again? This time it's a one party vote.
PIC and PAX vote :-)

Gary Archer and I have decided to fly for some expensive eggs. I'll be asking where you want to go. I'll have three choices... ACK, SFM, or CQX... Tally up the answers and post it Friday night for the planning...

If we leave early enough, we can get back and still have a Saturday to do your honey-do lists...

Soooooo, vote, doesn't matter if you're a pax or pic... just vote if you're coming along.

See ya Saturday,
Besides, how else can you fly safe if you don't fly often :-)

Gary and Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: $100 eggs and bacon... You vote!
